amendment.description: To set aside funds for certain projects and activities at the Alabama-Coosa River,

vote.text: Amendment SA 1678 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1678 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S11533; text: CR S11533) To set aside funds for certain projects and activities at the Alabama-Coosa River,

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1678 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
